text_block_list.text:
Even after the final leg of the Triple Tiara, the 『Shuuka Sho』, 
was over, Rhein Kraft continued to run seriously.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
The 『Mile Championship』! 
Rhein Kraft comes in 3rd! 3rd place!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
It wasn't a bad run. It's her first run against Senior class 
opponents, but I think she was able to display her power.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa……

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, what's happened to Rhein Kraft? Placing 4th as the favorite! 
Since it's a G2, I thought she'd be able to run more freely.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Normally, I'd think she'd be able to put 
up more of a fight……I wonder what's wrong.

text_block_list.name: Teammates
text_block_list.text: Awwwww, Kraft～……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Seems like she's slowly getting worse……Trainer. 
We've done what we can, but still……

Yeah, it's definitely some kind of mental block…… 
Let's revise the training menu so we can keep supporting her.

Yeah, it's definitely some kind of mental block…… 
Let's revise the training menu so we can keep supporting her.

Her condition was deteriorating each day. She was clearly affected 
by missing out on the Unorthodox Triple Crown. The team would 
continue to work together to get her through this slump.

Kraft, for now, we're going to focus on mental training. 
While your body rests, we'll focus on lectures……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Mental……? N-no, you don't need to worry about that. 
I'm fine! I'm fine so……

Kraft, there's something I want to give you. 
King……

Kraft, there's something I want to give you. 
King……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it's this. It's something that Trainer and I 
have been writing up together for the past few days.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: This is……to help me pull out of this slump……

Yeah. It's a roadmap we've created by watching race footage 
and researching the latest breakthroughs in sports medicine.

Yeah. It's a roadmap we've created by watching race footage 
and researching the latest breakthroughs in sports medicine.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If you follow this, then you'll definitely get back 
on your feet. Kraft-san, let's keep motivated. Okay?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Uu, ugh, Uuuu……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry…… Trainer-san and King-san 
both worked so hard, but I……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
But I couldn't do it…… I'm so pathetic…… 
I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Kraft-san……

No matter how much we wanted to support her, it still seemed 
like the current Rhein Kraft was still feeling overwhelmed.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Where……is this……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
There's a light……coming from up there…… 
If I head that way……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Eh……it's closing, it's closing……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
――!? What's with this creepy world? 
……Am I stuck in here?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ugh……my mind……feels blank…… 
W-what is this……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
It feels like I'm being swallowed up……!? 
For now, I need to get away from here! Kuu……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Huh? Huh?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? Why!? 
Why am I back here again!? Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (This scene……keeps repeating……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(No matter how many times I try, or what I do, 
nothing changes…… It's the same…… The same……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Fate――can't be changed.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Haa!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: A dream……? This is……reality, right……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(Cesario's empty bed…… 
Without a doubt, this is reality……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
What was that place……? 
Even now, in my mind……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
That haunting scenery…… 
It had……a really heavy atmosphere.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(Just what was that……? What happened there……? 
Anyways, this weird feeling started back when……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(I lost the 『Shuuka Sho』…… I don't have a goal anymore, 
and my body feels weird…… almost like……it's fading……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(It's almost like…… like it's disappearing…… 
That's right, I wasn't able to accomplish a historic 
feat…… I don't……even have a reason to exist……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(No matter how much I run, I won't win…… Without a doubt, 
my running will be forgotten in the next 10 years……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Even though the stars will twinkle for decades, 
centuries, my shine……won't reach anyone, will it……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I wonder……if I'll be able to sleep……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Even if I fall asleep……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Huh!? As I thought……this world……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Eh……that flower……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ah……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Kyaaaaaaa!?
